medical_history.chief_complaint: Left main bronchial mass with symptoms of productive cough and blood-stained sputum for longer than 2 months.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began more than 2 months ago, with persistent productive cough and blood-stained sputum. The intensity of symptoms has been significant enough to warrant medical attention.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of left renal clear cell carcinoma 3 years previously, for which he underwent radical nephrectomy.
medical_history.social_history: 60 pack-year history of smoking, which has contributed to poor lung function.
